originalTitle: Ugandan MP and Bobi Wine ally arrested over election violence
title: Ugandan MP and Bobi Wine ally arrested over election violence
content: The opposition politician is accused of election violence in which at least seven people were killed.

originalTitle: Slashed incomes and gamers go cold turkey: the fallout from Uganda's internet shutdown
title: Slashed incomes and gamers go cold turkey: the fallout from Uganda's internet shutdown
content: The internet was shut during the general election, leaving many people without any income - or entertainment.

originalTitle: Guinea-Bissau coup leaders set December election date
title: Guinea-Bissau coup leaders set December election date
content: Regional powers Ecowas had previously warned junta head Horta N'Tam against such a long wait for elections.

originalTitle: US envoy meets SDF commander, calls for Syria ceasefire to be upheld
title: US envoy meets SDF commander, calls for Syria ceasefire to be upheld
content: After meeting with the SDF's commander, US's Tom Barrack said all parties agreed upholding the truce is 'essential'.

originalTitle: Trump’s ‘Board of Peace’ sees Hamas disarmed and glitzy Gaza towers
title: Trump’s ‘Board of Peace’ sees Hamas disarmed and glitzy Gaza towers
content: Donald Trump launched his “Board of Peace” with a vision of Gaza that sees Hamas disarmed and real estate developed.

originalTitle: Former Special Counsel Jack Smith testifies before US Congress committee
title: Former Special Counsel Jack Smith testifies before US Congress committee
content: Smith told Congress that he found 'proof beyond a reasonable doubt that President Trump engaged in criminal activity'.

originalTitle: US optimistic on end to war as Zelensky says Ukraine to talk to US and Russia
title: US optimistic on end to war as Zelensky says Ukraine to talk to US and Russia
content: The meeting came as US envoy Steve Witkoff headed to Moscow for a meeting with Russia's Vladimir Putin.

originalTitle: France seizes suspected Russian 'shadow fleet' oil tanker in the Mediterranean
title: France seizes suspected Russian 'shadow fleet' oil tanker in the Mediterranean
content: The vessel, named Grinch, was stopped by the French navy as it travelled through waters between Spain and Morocco.

originalTitle: ICE detains 5-year-old and father in Minnesota, lawyer says
title: ICE detains 5-year-old and father in Minnesota, lawyer says
content: The boy was taken along with his father, the lawyer and school officials say. ICE says it was not targeting the boy.

originalTitle: Midfielder Casemiro to leave Man Utd this summer
title: Midfielder Casemiro to leave Man Utd this summer
content: Manchester United say midfielder Casemiro will leave the club when his contract expires at the end of this season.

originalTitle: 'Ridiculous amount of games' - has Haaland played too much football?
title: 'Ridiculous amount of games' - has Haaland played too much football?
content: Erling Haaland made a blistering start to the season but that prolific run of form has ground to a halt with only one goal in his past eight games.

originalTitle: 'Unique' Rogers looks to prove worth for Villa & England
title: 'Unique' Rogers looks to prove worth for Villa & England
content: Morgan Rogers says he "can be anything" - while the Aston Villa star is talking about his positional flexibility, rather than boasting about his quality, his confidence is well-placed.
